pageContext.claim: “I'll be honest, we are being taken advantage of by virtually every one of those countries. Very, very seriously. Now, the United States, because of bad management at the top, because of Presidents that didn't care about trade or didn't understand it or whatever reason.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is being rather insulting, and inaccurate, to suggest previous presidents "didn't care about trade." all presidents care about trade and many recent presidents have negotiated major trade agreements.
